view.controls

Class WindowControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.controls.WindowControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, ListBox, TextBox

    public abstract class WindowControl
extends java.lang.Object
    WindowControl class. A window control can be used to get data from the user
    Author:
    groep 03
